body: Some men like tall girls, some women like short men. Giantism is just that but put to the extreme. Just like how women with cartoonishly large breasts are attractive to some people, seeing a woman the size of a large building turns some guys on. I like tall girls, but im not that interested in giant women that are sky scraper size. Hope that answers @lightningmcneutron69's question.
